dc:title: The Daily Worker Case
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Criticizes a raid on the communist paper, The Daily Worker, as a blow against freedom guaranteed by the constitution. Says it is a sin to keep silent and that "freedom in general is essentially a religious concept."
